faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: HelpMeClean is in pre-launch phase. We're preparing to open the platform soon, starting with Bucharest. Join the waitlist to get priority access and launch notifications.
faq.q2: How do I register as a cleaning company?
faq.a2: You can apply as a partner company through the 'For Companies' page. You need a valid tax ID (CUI), civil liability insurance and company documents. The verification process takes up to 48 hours, after which your account is activated.
faq.a3: Each partner company undergoes a document verification process (registration certificate, civil insurance, tax ID). We actively verify identity and documents to ensure our clients only work with trusted professionals.
